subject: Automobile Racing
Flags, Emblems and Insignia
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Although Nascar has stopped short of an outright ban, officials at every racetrack that hosts an event in the top three national series asked fans to no longer display the flags at their tracks.
snippet: Although Nascar has stopped short of an outright ban, officials at every racetrack that hosts an event in the top three national series asked fans to no longer display the flags at their tracks.
